title: Updated!
author: verias
text:
Cameos: None

Hidden Names: Craig Blackwood

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Whee!

Page shaded and up! You guys enjoy!

replies.author: JD*Guest*
replies.text: Couldn't find it, couldn't find it. Zoomed way in, looked at the doorpanel armrest, nope. All over the beast, little marks, but nope. Stain on the ceiling, just a stain. Argh, I give up... but wait, if you tilt your head just right that stain kinda looks like...

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text: New and improved! Now with realistic shading!
